function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of transmission risk and vulnerability","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and vulnerability","Mitigation":"Provide education and training on transmission risk and vulnerability, implement safety protocols","Technologies":"Knowledge base systems, AI for risk analysis","People":"Population, especially vulnerable groups","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate modeling of population behavior and characteristics","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and safety measures","Mitigation":"Develop accurate models of population behavior, gather real-time data, implement dynamic risk assessment","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning for behavior prediction","People":"Population, behavior analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, data science teams"},{"Description":"Failure to represent complex concepts in the knowledge base","Impact":"Inability to capture nuances of different entities and relationships","Mitigation":"Customize knowledge base to represent specific application domain, refine and expand concept descriptions","Technologies":"Custom knowledge base development tools","People":"Domain experts, knowledge engineers","Owner":"Application developers, domain specialists"}]}
